name: Paper Pets
description:
Explore population dynamics by building a small ecosystem of paper creatures in a terrarium! Watch their numbers fluctuate as they reproduce and interact with other organisms! Grow your populations and add new creatures to produce more and new colors of paper to craft more species! Be sure to maintain proper ecosystem balance, or else it may collapse...

Paper Pets is a low-stakes and relaxing experience. Inspirations include real world terraria and aquaria where you observe creatures in an environment similar to their natural ones.

Paper Pets is a short ecosystem simulator put together by a small team of university students.

Credits

  • Ashley Legand - artwork
  • Noah Page - design, programming
  • Udayan Senapati - design, programming, artwork
  • Gavin Shirey - concept, design, programming, artwork
  • Stephen Wang - design, programming
